results.title: Effects of metformin and simvastatin treatment on ultrastructural features of liver macrophages in HFD mice.
results.text_hl: Both @CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ reduced the @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@liver damage@@@ in HFD fed animals, manifested as the prevention of @<m>DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@nonalcoholic steatohepatitis@@@ development and reduced activation and number of macrophages in the liver, as well as the percentage of these cells with @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ droplets in the cytoplasm compared to untreated HFD animals.

results.title: Statins as a Potential Treatment for Non-Alcoholic Fatty Liver Disease: Target Deconvolution using Protein-protein Interaction Network Analysis.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ has the most impact on @<m>DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@NAFLD@@@-related genes versus other statins.

results.title: Promising therapeutic use of Baccharis trimera (less.) DC. as a natural hepatoprotective agent against hepatic lesions that are caused by multiple risk factors.
results.text_hl: In contrast to insulin + @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment, all three doses of B. trimera effectively reduced @GENE_GOT2 @GENE_25721 @@@AST@@@ and ALT levels.

results.title: Sini powder ameliorates the inflammatory response in rats with stress-induced non-alcoholic fatty liver disease by inhibiting the nuclear factor kappa-B / pyrin domain-containing protein 3 pathway.
results.text_hl: Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ and Sini powder significantly ameliorated the @<m>DISEASE_Non_alcoholic_Fatty_Liver_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065626 @@@NAFLD@@@ pathology and the abnormal expression of NF-kappaB, @GENE_NLRP3 @GENE_287362 @@@NLRP3@@@, @GENE_PYCARD @GENE_282817 @@@ASC@@@, @GENE_CASP1 @GENE_25166 @@@caspase-1@@@, @GENE_IL1B @GENE_24494 @@@IL-1beta@@@, and @GENE_IL6 @GENE_24498 @@@IL-6@@@ (all P < 0.01).
